name: House Designer
description:
A marketing software made as a freelance project for houses realtor to advertise houses more efficient and help people sell and buy houses faster.
 The software is still under development as it still a prototype for what the final product will look like.

name: A.M.R.B
description:
An augmented reality app made as a freelance project, part of a PhD in 'Innovative ways of teaching' to help students of faculty of physical education to learn in more fun and innovative ways.
 The app contains 35+ 3D animations and videos  and more content will be added for all 4 years students.
